alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Norfolk, southwestern Essex, Suffolk, east central Worcester, eastern Middlesex, north central Plymouth and northern Providence Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Acton to Wayland to Dover to near Plainville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boston, Lowell, Cambridge, Quincy, Lynn, Newton, Lawrence, Somerville, Framingham, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Weymouth, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem and Billerica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
